name: Refashion Grandma’s Dress
description:
Hi! Little Princess.Welcome to Refashion Grandma’s Dress !There are so many exciting ideas fill in beautiful princess’s head every day.Right now, beautiful princess gets another idea~she wanna Refashion Grandma’s Dress !But the question is grandma’s dress is popular at her time, and is used to older,the color of these clothes is dark.Next, Grandma’s size is bigger than beautiful princess. If beautiful princess wanna wear her grandma’s clothes, she has to redesign them.Cut, paint and so on.Do you wanna join Refashion Grandma’s Dress ? Come on!

Key Features:
- Pick up a dress form grandma’s closet
- Refashion Grandma’s Dress , little tailor’s born
- Bigger size? longer sleeves? Cut for a suitable size
- Paint your favorite color
- Refashion Grandma’s Dress , perfect change
